name: Lost Realms of Murkasada: Episode 1
overview: Lost Realms of Murkasada: Episode 1 is a brand new freeware adventure game with role-playing elements for the Commodore 64. It was released on June 16, 2021 and developed by Arkanix Labs. It is a companion/side adventure/rpg-lite of their development C64 CRPG Crimson Twilight which they are currently working on.
